message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.CE, cs.CV. 

This paper deals with a machine learning problem of selecting the best classifier from a large set of classifiers using small subsets of training data. This problem is a core topic in the field of machine learning, which falls under the category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper proposes a novel strategy for solving this problem, which involves allocating data using upper bounds. This strategy is related to the field of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and data science (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the practical behavior of the proposed strategy using real-world datasets, which is relevant to the field of computer vision (cs.CV) and computational engineering (cs.CE).
